summary:
I do patents.

For family companies, startups, listed multinationals, investors and universities. By drafting and prosecuting applications, providing portfolio advice and due diligence services and by supporting to resolve conflicts - or to avoid conflicts. To defend their rightful interests in any way that fits their business.

I do so, convinced that each client deserves the same level of support, attention and quality.

Because every party has the right to have control over their innovation, either to share it or to keep it to themselves in order to benefit from that innovation and receive a fair return on investment.
Because there is no substitute for quality.
And because I love sharing my experience with any innovative party I believe in, irrespective of their stature.

And most of all, because I love this profession.
